meanings.sent1: The introrse petals of the flower curled inwards towards the center.
meanings.sent2: The cat's introrse tail showed its fear as it tucked it between its legs.
meanings.sent3: The introrse umbrella turned inside out in the strong wind, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were introrse, focusing only on her own feelings and emotions.
meanings.sent5: The introrse gaze of the owl made the small mouse freeze in fear.

meanings.definition: Turned or facing inward or towards the axis.
meanings.sent1: The introrse branches of the tree intertwined towards the center of the trunk.
meanings.sent2: The introrse design of the spiral staircase made it feel like you were being pulled inwards.
meanings.sent3: The introrse arrow unexpectedly turned back towards the archer, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: His introrse personality made it hard for others to get to know him deeply.
meanings.sent5: The introrse path through the forest led them deeper into the heart of the woods.
